Encoding = UTF-8

*GTD.BrokenHttpLinksCheckers
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
ID; Type;      Schema; Hostname;              Path;                            Head_Status_Code; Get_Status_Code ; tags ; Redirect_Header_Location
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1;  LOCAL;     https;  localhost;             /fail;                           400             ; -               ; "localhost" ; ""
2;  LOCAL;     http;   localhost;             /success;                        200             ; -               ; "localhost" ; ""
3;  NUMERIC;   http;   127.0.0.1;             /success;                        200             ; -               ; "localhost" ; ""
4;  NORMAL;    https;  github.com;            /uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 200             ; 201             ; ""          ; ""
5;  NORMAL;    https;  github.com;            /uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 307             ; -               ; ""          ; "https://github.com/uniqueck/htmlSanityCheck"
5;  NORMAL;    https;  github.com;            /uniqueck/asciidoctor-liquibase; 307             ; -               ; ""          ; ""

*Gtd.HttpStatusCodes
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Cat;         Configure_Status_Code_Range ; Filter
-------------------------------------------------------
SUCCESS;     200,201,203                 ; '\(200;201;203)'
WARN;        301,302                     ; '\(301;302)'
ERROR;       401,402,403                 ; '\(401;402;403)'
